app.name: Driving licence Practice app Japan
app.description: Driving licence Practice app Japan is a comprehensive mobile application designed to help users prepare for the Japanese driving license test. The app offers a variety of practice questions, mock tests, and study materials to enhance learning and improve test-taking skills.

app.name: JLPT N5
app.description: JLPT N5 is an app designed to help users prepare for the Japanese Language Proficiency Test (JLPT) at the N5 level. It offers a variety of study materials, including vocabulary lists, grammar explanations, practice questions, and mock tests to enhance learning and improve test-taking skills.
